Paragraph.Text: Operate a boiler at a public assembly location without a valid certificate of compliance for that boiler;
Give false or forged information to the department or an inspector for the purpose of obtaining a certificate of compliance;
Use a certificate of compliance for any boiler other than for the boiler for which it was issued;
Operate a boiler for which the certificate of compliance has been suspended;
Give false or forged information to the department for the purpose of obtaining a certificate of competence; or
Inspect any boiler regulated under the provisions of ss. 554.1011-554.115 without having a valid certificate of competency.

Subsection.Text: Any person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable by fine as provided in s. 775.083.
